title: Forest Green Rovers: The completely vegan football club
content: This video can not be playedNot many football teams have an environmental conscience, but National League side Forest Green Rovers are the only completely vegan football club.The traditional beef burger is replaced by quinoa on a match day, and they are now proposing to build the world’s first ever wooden eco-friendly stadium.
